value.0:
[This letter, found amidst the belongings of Chancellor Varhun of Ghaarak, reads:

"Chancellor, I write in response to your plea for aid with your current... dilemma...  It seems both you and I have a great desire to see an end to the rule of Magistrate Okaris, a thorn in both our sides.  I have devised a plan in which we may rid ourselves of the Magistrate once and for all, one which we will discuss in further detail upon my arrival.  Should you hear of an appearance by a prophet, garbed in red, be prepared to take matters into your own hands immediately.

Beyond that, you may choose how else to serve your own advancement in the Imperial ranks.  Just be certain to use discretion, as it would not do for our plans to be revealed prematurely.

Remember, should the prophet in red appear, it is imperative that Okaris does not live to see the next dawn.  If you serve us well, we may be able to find other purposes to which we can apply your skills..."

The letter is unsigned.]
